Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: シャオルーン
Entry.EnglishText: Shaorune

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: notice
Entry.EnglishText: Notice

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Agarte>
Entry.EnglishText: <Agarte>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: 蒼の聖殿
Entry.EnglishText: Azure Sanctuary

Entry.JapaneseText: 蒼の聖殿
Entry.EnglishText: Azure Sanctuary

Entry.JapaneseText: ようこそ、<Veigue>。
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome, <Veigue>.

Entry.JapaneseText: その声は……!? 姿を現せ!!
Entry.EnglishText: I know that voice...! Show yourself!

Entry.JapaneseText: うん、お見せしよう!!
Entry.EnglishText: Ask, and you shall receive!

Entry.JapaneseText: ぼくが、水の聖獣シャオルーンだ!! やっと会えたね、<Veigue>。
Entry.EnglishText: I am Shaorune, the Sacred Beast of Aqua! Nice to finally meet you, <Veigue>.

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえが、聖獣シャオルーン……
Entry.EnglishText: So you're Shaorune...

Entry.JapaneseText: という事で、 ひとつめの試練はおしまい。
Entry.EnglishText: And thusly, your first trial has come to an end.

Entry.JapaneseText: ぼくのところへおいでって言った時、 キミはそれだけか、って聞いた。
Entry.EnglishText: When I first told you to come find me, all you had to say was "That's it?"

Entry.JapaneseText: 本当に<Yellow><scale:120>それだけ<scale:100><White>だったかい？
Entry.EnglishText: So, how are you feeling about that now?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……次の試練は？
Entry.EnglishText: ...What's the next trial?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……まあ、いいや。 ふたつめの試練は、 ぼくと戦って勝つ事。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, very well. For your second trial, I want you to beat me in a fight,

Entry.JapaneseText: ぼくの力を使うに足る能力が あるかどうか、試させてもらう。
Entry.EnglishText: Let me see if you're really capable of wielding my power.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……おいで、<Veigue>。
Entry.EnglishText: Come on, <Veigue>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><Veigue>を含む パーティ編成にしてください。
Entry.EnglishText: You must form a party that includes <Veigue>.

Entry.JapaneseText: さあ、始めようか!!
Entry.EnglishText: All right, let's begin!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……やるね。 ふたつめの試練はこれでおしまい！ 残る試練はひとつ！
Entry.EnglishText: ...Nicely done. That's it for the second trial. Just one more to go!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……キミに尋ねよう。 キミの隣にいる彼女は……
Entry.EnglishText: I have but one question to ask you... She who stands beside you...

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアだ。
Entry.EnglishText: She's Claire.

Entry.JapaneseText: まだ言い終わってないのに。
Entry.EnglishText: I didn't even get to finish...

Entry.JapaneseText: オレの隣にいるのは……クレアだ。 ……クレアだ……クレアなんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: The person beside me is Claire! She's Claire... Claire and no one else!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……そう言うと思ってたけど。 それがキミの答なんだね？
Entry.EnglishText: I thought you might say that. So, is that really your answer?

Entry.JapaneseText: うん、じゃあ、 三つめの試練は終わりだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Okay, then your third trial is done and dusted.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……どういうつもりだ？ オレの答は、おまえの求めた ものだったのか？
Entry.EnglishText: What do you mean? Was my answer the one you were looking for?

Entry.JapaneseText: 答え合わせをしたわけじゃない。 ぼくは、キミの答を尋ねただけだ。 キミなりの答……決意を。
Entry.EnglishText: I wasn't looking for a specific answer, I just wanted to hear what yours was. You gave me an answer that was all your own and showed your resolve.

Entry.JapaneseText: そして、キミの答にぼくは満足した。 だから、試練は終わった。
Entry.EnglishText: And I'm satisfied with it. Therefore, you're all done.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが……だが、オレは……
Entry.EnglishText: But...But, I...

Entry.JapaneseText: そう、キミは迷っている。 でも、それでいいじゃないか。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, I know you still have doubts. But what's wrong with that?

Entry.JapaneseText: 「迷い」を知った時点で、 もう「答」は出ているんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: By the time you've come to understand your doubts, you'll already have the answers.

Entry.JapaneseText: シャオルーン、おまえの力で、 クレアを元に戻せないのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Shaorune, can your power turn Claire back to normal?

Entry.JapaneseText: 残念だけど、ぼくにはムリだ。
Entry.EnglishText: No can do, sorry.

Entry.JapaneseText: たとえできたとしても、 問題は解決しない。 キミもわかっているはずだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Even if I could, it wouldn't fix your issues. I think you ought to understand that.

Entry.JapaneseText: ナイショ話はおしまい。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, time to stop talking in secret.

Entry.JapaneseText: さあ、試練は終わりだ、<Veigue>！ もう一度、確認しておくよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Okay, you've completed every trial, <Veigue>! Let me confirm with you once more.

Entry.JapaneseText: キミは、ぼくの<Blue>水の力<White>を 求めるかい？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you seek my <Blue>Power of Aqua<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……オレは求める。 聖獣シャオルーン、おまえの力を！
Entry.EnglishText: I do. Sacred Beast Shaorune, grant me your power!

Entry.JapaneseText: いい返事だ!! さあ、フォルスを!!
Entry.EnglishText: That's what I'm talking about! Now, manifest your Force!

Entry.JapaneseText: これが……聖獣の力か……
Entry.EnglishText: So this is the power of a Sacred Beast...

Entry.JapaneseText: やったネ、<Veigue>！
Entry.EnglishText: You did it, <Veigue>!

Entry.JapaneseText: どうだ、すげーだろ？
Entry.EnglishText: Well? Feels awesome, right?!

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ……
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah...

Entry.JapaneseText: さて……次の聖獣はこう言っている。 <Hilda>、キミに……
Entry.EnglishText: Now then... I have a message from the next Sacred Beast. It's for you, <Hilda>.
For me?!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Cyan>「自分が何者かを知れ。 道は汝の中にある」<White>
Entry.EnglishText: "<Cyan>Become aware of what you are. The path lies within yourself.<White>"

Entry.JapaneseText: ……自分が何者かを……
Entry.EnglishText: ...What I am...

Entry.JapaneseText: じゃあ、ぼくは一足お先に 外で待つとしよう。
Entry.EnglishText: Okay, I'll go on ahead and wait for you guys outside.

Entry.JapaneseText: え……どういうコト？
Entry.EnglishText: Huh? What are you talking about?

Entry.JapaneseText: ぼくも、キミたちと一緒に 旅をする事に決めたのさ。
Entry.EnglishText: I've decided that I'm going to tag along with you on your journey.

Entry.JapaneseText: ぼくは<Yellow>ヒト<White>が好きなんだ。 もっと良く知りたい。
Entry.EnglishText: I like <Yellow>Humans<White>, so I wanna learn more about them!

Entry.JapaneseText: これからはぼくが、キミたちを 好きなところへ連れて行ってあげる。 ぼくは、翼になる。
Entry.EnglishText: From now on, I'll take you guys wherever you want to go. I'll be your wings.
Wings?

Entry.JapaneseText: そう！ キミたちを 大空へいざなう……翼だ！
Entry.EnglishText: Yep! I'll be the wings that take you soaring high into the heavens!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……なんだ、ありゃあ……？
Entry.EnglishText: ...What the heck was that?

Entry.JapaneseText: よくわかんないけど、 仲間が増えたって コトなんじゃない？
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not really sure either, but I think we just made a new friend?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……とにかくここを出て、 シャオルーンのところへ 行ってみよう。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, we should probably get out of here and meet up with him.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><Veigue>は 奥義『崩龍無影剣』が 習得可能になりました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><Veigue> can now learn the Fusion Force "Frostwyrm Shadow."

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: ……前に来た時には、 こんなものはなかった……
Entry.EnglishText: ...There was nothing like this the last time we were here.
Entry.Notes: I believe dialogue changes on character - this one's Veigue

Entry.JapaneseText: ラッキー!! 前に来た時には 何もなかったのに！
Entry.EnglishText: Lucky! We didn't see anything like this last time!

Entry.JapaneseText: うむ……以前、ここには 何もなかったと思うが……
Entry.EnglishText: Hmm... I don't think there was anything last time...

Entry.JapaneseText: まさか、こんなところに…… とても意外な感じね。
Entry.EnglishText: I would never imagine that in a place like this... This is really unexpected.

Entry.JapaneseText: おう、こんなとこに発見が！ おどろき桃の木だぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: To think you can find a peach tree here in a place like this!

Entry.JapaneseText: こんなところに…… そう、こんな事もあるのね。
Entry.EnglishText: In a place like this... Right, such things can be found.

Entry.JapaneseText: 初めてのアイテム会話
Entry.EnglishText: First Time Item Conversation

Entry.JapaneseText: 一度行った場所でも、 何か見つかる場合が あるという事か……
Entry.EnglishText: It could be the case that there's something new is in places places we have already visited...

Entry.JapaneseText: 一度行ったところでも、 調べに行ったら、 新しい発見があるかもネ！
Entry.EnglishText: If we go check any places we visited before, we may discover something new!

Entry.JapaneseText: 一度行った場所でも、 新しい発見があるかもしれんな。
Entry.EnglishText: If we go check any places we visited before, we may find something new.

Entry.JapaneseText: 一度行った場所でも、こうやって 調べたら何かみつかるかも……？
Entry.EnglishText: Even if we've been here before, we may find something new if we investigate...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 前に行った場所でも、 もういっぺん行ってみたら、 何か見つかるかもしれないな！
Entry.EnglishText: If we go to places we already visited before, we might find something new!

Entry.JapaneseText: 行った事がある場所でも、 もう一度調べたら、何か見つかる かもしれないって事ね……
Entry.EnglishText: If we go check places we already visited, we could probably find something new...

Entry.JapaneseText: 初めてのアイテム会話
Entry.EnglishText: First Time Item Conversation
